project.Title: Alraune - Modded Class
project.ItemDescription:
Hi! Welcome to the Alraune modded class! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This class is a stress healer/ tank character with potential to function as a blight damage dealer. He is particularly effective at tanking stress and bleeding attacks.
This class is mine (Kwarma) and mine alone as far as publication goes. If you want to feature this class in videos, streams, modpacks, go nuts as I would love to see them. Message me on discord Kwarma#8954 or get in touch with me through the moonlit dungeon discord so I can watch as well and see what you think. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Crit Buff- 1/2 regeneration
Combat Skills 1. Strike- basic attack with a medium blight and decent crit chance _ _XX - XXX_
2. Shunt- lower damage AOE attack with low blight _XX_ - X-X-X_
3. Petrify- self prot. buff, self cure, moves self back 2 _XXX
4. Shelter- 2 turn, single target guard and moderate stress heal on target, slight stress resist buff on self XXXX XXXX
5. Brambles- single target, single use, battle long buff that adds prot. and damage reflect to a friendly target and moderate damage reflection to self XXXX XXXX
6. Brace- team wide, friendly AOE low stress heal and -crit received buff _ _XX X-X-X-X
7. Timber- medium-high damage AOE attack that moves self forward 3 with a 66% chance to guard each teammate for 1 turn, this attack gains more range the higher its level lvl 0: X_ _ _ - X-X_ _ lvl 2: X_ _ _ - X-X-X_ lvl 4: X_ _ _ - X-X-X-X
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Camp Skills
Uproot- cost 1 increase self speed
Reminisce- cost 3 reduce self stress, 50% chance to reduce each party member's stress
Growth- cost 4 fully heal self and cure, increase healing received for 4 battles
Bird Song- cost 5 3 rolls of 50% to reduce party member's stress by 10
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This class comes with 8 custom trinkets for the Alraune himself including a trophy and a pet that you have to find :)
CC and CoM trinkets are coming soon!
This mod also introduces 2 new quirks that will increase or decrease the stress healing received from the Alraune's stress healing abilities.
It also adds 3 new camping ambushes to the party if the Alraune is in the party on a weald mission (this is the only way to get 3 of his slightly stronger trinkets)
A town event accompanies this mod in order to introduce your first alraune, but he can also appear in the stagecoach at the same frequency as a man at arms.
NAME AND LORE EXPLANATION https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yOdlQISZqDiTh946lu8bl8vuxjFr6SDsJJ3K5HTL5r4/edit?usp=sharing --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FUN FACTS! The Alraune's default name is Jakob after the scientist in the book after which he is so named.
He doesn't talk much. This is partially due to him being sad and out of his own time, but also due to the infection controlling an unspecified amount of his body and also his mind.
The alraune loves animals and therefore his favorite class to pair up with is houndmaster. This is canon as I have just now made it so. you're welcome
